name: Lofi.Parse

values.name: parseElement
values.comment:
Parses a single #lofi line into an Element

    parseElement "Click me #button #primary"

name: Lofi

aliases.name: KeyPath
aliases.comment: A list of keys used in @mentions

aliases.name: Mention
aliases.comment: A reference to an external resource

aliases.name: Text
aliases.comment: Normal text to be displayed as-is

types.name: Element
types.comment: A #lofi element, representing a single line
cases: { texts : List Lofi.Text , mentions : List Lofi.Mention , tags : Lofi.Tags , items : List Lofi.Element }

types.name: TagValue
types.comment: The value of a tag, either a boolean, or nested content
cases: { texts : List Lofi.Text, mentions : List Lofi.Mention }
